section_overview: Stay close to Wellington International with options that match your ring schedule and barn life. Whether you need an early-morning walk to the jog strip, an RV spot near stabling, or a short-drive rental with a kitchen, there’s a setup to fit.
section_spotlight: Barn-friendly rentals with kitchens and washers are in highest demand — book early.
section_cta_text: Secure your WEF lodging before stalls are full — pick the stay that matches your ride times.

hotels.$: Budget, practical hotel rooms within 15 minutes
hotels.$$: Mid-range with breakfast and late checkout
hotels.$$$: Upscale hotels or resorts within 30 minutes

rvparks.on_site: RV parking directly on or adjacent to venue

hotels.name: Palm Court Inn
hotels.notes: Early breakfast, quiet floors, SUV parking.

rvparks.name: Wellington Equestrian RV Park
rvparks.notes: Full hookups, direct golf cart path to vendor row.

airbnb.name: Wellington Barnhouse
airbnb.notes: 3BR, washer/dryer, tack trunk storage in garage.

section_meta_description: Plan your Wellington International stay with hotels, RV parks, and rentals tailored to equestrian life at WEF.
